com.rm.reagroup.robot

Class ToyRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rm.reagroup.robot.ToyRobot

  • public class ToyRobot
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the robot itself.
    Author:
    hawk

    • Method Detail

      • getRobotInstance

        public static ToyRobot getRobotInstance()
        Method to fetch the single robot instance in this JVM.
        Returns:
        ToyRobot object

      • isPlacedCorrectly

        public boolean isPlacedCorrectly()
        If the Position object of this robot is non-null, this function returns true, else it returns false. Position object is set only when it was within the bounds of the current playfield / IShape object.
        Returns:
        true if robot is within the playfield, false otherwise

      • getCurrentPosition

        public Position getCurrentPosition()
        Return the current position of the robot.
        Returns:
        current Position

      • place

        public boolean place(Position newPosition,
                     IShape playfield)
        Checks whether the position passed in will place the robot on the @IShape correctly or no.
        Parameters:
        newPosition - - new position to place robot.
        playfield - - @IShape on which to place robot.
        Returns:
        If placement is possible, the function sets the position object of the robot to 'newPosition' and returns true. false otherwise.

      • move

        public boolean move(IShape playfield)
        This method will move the robot in the direction it is currently facing
        Parameters:
        playfield - - Shape on which to move the robot.
        Returns:
        - true - if the move was successful false - if otherwise OR if shape was null;

      • rotate

        public boolean rotate(RotateDirection dir)
        This method will rotate the robot.
        Parameters:
        dir - - Direction to turn the robot to - LEFT / RIGHT
        Returns:
        - true when rotation was successful false if direction was wrong, or rotation was unsuccessful

      • resetRobot

        public static void resetRobot()
        This method will nullify all the properties of the robot and destroy the object. Thereby resetting it. Use carefully!

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
